name: k6-for-studies
description: Repository for examples by Performance Testing using K6

scripts.docker:loadTest: docker-compose up -d influxdb grafana && webpack && docker-compose run k6 run /dist/fullFlowLoad.test.js --insecure-skip-tls-verify
scripts.docker:stressTest: docker-compose up -d influxdb grafana && webpack && docker-compose run k6 run /dist/fullFlowStress.test.js --insecure-skip-tls-verify

author: Lucas Fraga <ulucasfraga@gmail.com>
